name: My Hero Halloween
description:
MY HERO ACADEMIA - HALLOWEEN SPECIAL - OTOME GAME

• Changeable name
• Implied gender is she/her (due to dorm placement assumptions)
• 4 Romances: Deku, Bakugou, Todoroki, Uraraka
• Warnings: Mild swearing, minor BNHA spoilers up to season 4

Story:

Something strange has been going on in the dorm, Heights Alliance, where all of Class 1-A lives. It's up to you to figure out what's happening, on top of training, and preparing for the upcoming Halloween costume contest! You may even grow closer to a certain classmate in the process.

This is my first game but I hope to keep learning as well as make more in the future!
You can contact me at my Tumblr, Twitter, or TikTok.

CREDITS: To the best of my ability, I have tried to correctly credit everything I used in the game. Please check the game "About" section to see them. 

This is a FREE game made for fun, to show my love and appreciation for the BNHA universe. 

All characters and original concepts belong to Boku no Hero Academia (c) Kohei Horikoshi!

If you'd like to tip me, you can do so here (but is not necessary at all)! 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Game Access
  1. You can play the game online at this link. It is not as fluid, especially in regards to music/sound effects but it does work pretty well otherwise.
  2. You can download the zip files. Read the "Install Instructions" below.
  3. It is meant to be played on a computer. Sorry, no mobile version.
Install Instructions
  • PC
    • Download the zipped file and unzip it
    • You should have a folder titled "My Hero Halloween 1.0 Dists"
    • Open the game, which is the .exe file and should have the game title
    • Enjoy!
  • Mac/Linux
    • Double click on the zipped folder to unzip it
    • You should have a folder titled "My Hero Halloween.app"
    • The game title is "My Hero Halloween" which you should find within the Contents > MacOS folder
    • Enjoy!

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any issues and I will try to help :)
